description: Chris’ began as an ice cream cart that took frozen treats through the streets of OKC. After gaining much popularity, Chris added a few grilled goods to the menu and now this truck is where you’ll find some of the most fantastically tasty American classics in town. His savory selection includes breakfast favorites like biscuits and gravy, burritos with bacon, sausage, ham, egg, cheese, and delicious grilled veggies. You’ll also find big ole juicy burgers and hot dogs with all your favorite toppings. And of course, you’re free to make your meal complete with some delicious ice cream. For all this and much more, you simply must come visit Chris’ Grill & Frozen Treats.
name: Chris' Grill & Frozen Treats
